creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of James J. Childs (1945-2015)
inscription: verso left side of matboard: Ludwig von Hofmann / Ludwig von Hofmann, german, (1861-1945) / 2 studies of a nude youth reclining; and a study of hands. / charcoal on gray laid paper / H 16 x W. 20 1/4 / source: Gunzenhauser, Munich, 1968 ($90) / PROPERTY OF CHARLES PAUL HELSELL
markings: printed labe verso CL: Ludwig von Hormann, German, 1861-1945 / STUDIES OF A NUDE BOY, ca. 1894 / charcoal on grey laid paper / 273 x 395 mm / signed, l.rt.c.: 'LvH' / from Gunzenhauser, Munich, 1968 / see Thieme-Becker or Vollmer
medium: Black chalk on gray laid paper
title: Studies of a Nude Youth
